extendedInfo.description: The First Advantage Mobile Banking app puts everyday banking tasks at your fingertips. You can check your account balances, view your recent activity and more!Itâs fast, itâs secure andâbest of allâitâs free. All you need is a First Advantage Online Banking account.â¢Check balances, search transaction history, and move money between your First Advantage accounts â¢Use your phoneâs GPS to find the ATM and Banking Center nearest youHow to get startedâ¢Mobile Banking is free from First Advantage Bank (but your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply) â¢Use the same username and password that you do for Online BankingHow youâre protectedâ¢We never store personal or account information on your phoneâ¢All transactions are encrypted with the same secure technology as Online Bankingâ¢The login process is the same as in Online Banking, with your same authentication image and phrase used as an added layer of protectionMember FDIC | Equal Housing Lender

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Totally grateful to have the app... Just a few suggestions: a 4 digit pin for logging in, instead of a full password, and some sort of alert options (like every transaction, or transaction over certain amount, or low balance alert). Please and thank you.
reviews.author: Shawna Lowe

reviews.title: Permissions?
reviews.comment: Needs permission to use the camera?
reviews.author: Raymond Holden

reviews.title: About time!!
reviews.comment: Thank you!! Works great so far.
reviews.author: danny lowe
